issue.title: hampshirelive.news
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.51

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.hampshirelive.news/sport/football/football-news/joe-shields-chelsea-southampton-hasenhuttl-7704305.amp

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![2022-10-15_12-46-7](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29574622/195973378-e3d406fc-2248-47ec-9d15-58314456c6ca.PNG)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.51

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.thechelseachronicle.com/news/absolutely-boehly-would-love-to-sign-world-class-forward-who-supported-chelsea-as-a-kid-journalist/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![2022-10-15_13-16-27](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29574622/195974511-fe738305-b27d-4c11-8c5d-ad175bd19545.PNG)


</details>



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
